    • Method Detail

      • getCommandInformation

        protected java.util.List<CcddCommandHandler.CommandInformation> getCommandInformation()
        Get the list of command information
        Returns:
        List of command information; returns an empty list if no commands exist

      • buildCommandReference

        protected java.lang.String buildCommandReference(java.lang.String commandName,
                                     java.lang.String commandCode,
                                     java.lang.String table,
                                     int numArgs)
        Build the command reference string
        Parameters:
        commandName - command name
        commandCode - command code
        table - command table to which the command belongs
        numArgs - number of arguments that are valid for this command
        Returns:
        Command reference string

      • getAllCommands

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllCommands()
        Get the list of commands
        Returns:
        List of commands; returns an empty list if no commands exist

      • buildCommandList

        protected void buildCommandList()
        Build the list of command information for every command defined in the project database. A single query is constructed to obtain the command information in order to reduce the number of transactions with the database (as opposed to using loadTableInformation() for each command table)
